data.title: Southwest Airlines Revenue 2010-2024 | LUV
data.meta_description:
Southwest Airlines annual/quarterly revenue history and growth rate from 2010 to 2024. Revenue can be defined as the amount of money a company receives from its customers in exchange for the sales of goods or services. Revenue is the top line item on an income statement from which all costs and expenses are subtracted to arrive at net income.
  • Southwest Airlines revenue for the quarter ending June 30, 2024 was $7.354B, a 4.5% increase year-over-year.
  • Southwest Airlines revenue for the twelve months ending June 30, 2024 was $27.031B, a 7.54% increase year-over-year.
  • Southwest Airlines annual revenue for 2023 was $26.091B, a 9.56% increase from 2022.
  • Southwest Airlines annual revenue for 2022 was $23.814B, a 50.82% increase from 2021.
  • Southwest Airlines annual revenue for 2021 was $15.79B, a 74.51% increase from 2020.
